entry.title: Understanding t-SNE by Implementing
entry.summary: In this blog post we will look into inner workings of the t-SNE algorithm, to clearly understand how it works, what it could be used for and what are its limitations. I will take a top-to-bottom approach first explaining more generally how the algorithm works on a higher level and then dive deeper into the mathematics behind it. The article contains code blocks in most places where there are eq...
